group_1.narration: "We told students that we were going@to start a citywide student conference, and@we got signatures, but that didn't tell us@how many people were going to participate."
"So we asked everyone at each@school to fill out a survey."
"And today, we're finally ready@to present the results."

group_1.textLeft: And since you're the Coordinator...

group_1.textRight: Indeed...
[chara:101701:effect_emotion_joy_0][se:7222_happy]Tadaaaa!♪
After polling all the students in Kamihama,
here are the results♪
*Gulp...*
I feel nervous...
Mm.
It appears we vastly underestimated the number@of students who wanted to participate.

group_1.textLeft: [chara:101701:effect_emotion_surprise_0][se:7226_shock]What?! Come on, Kanagi![chara:101701:lipSynch_0][wait:0.8][chara:101701:cheek_0][chara:101701:face_mtn_ex_030.exp3.json][chara:101701:lipSynch_1]@I wanted to make a big announcement...

group_1.textRight: Hnn, my apologies. I didn't mean to make it@sound like less than it was...

group_1.textLeft: *Giggle* Well, Kanagi said it.
Still, isn't it wonderful that every school has@people who want to participate?

group_1.textRight: We're finally taking a step forward from a@Magical Girls-only system.

group_1.textLeft: From this point on, opinions beyond ours@will be factored in.

group_1.textCenter: There must be more people like Tsukasa and I,
with close ties to both the East and the West.

group_1.textRight: I'm sure there'll be a lot of misunderstandings@between us.

group_1.textCenter: Indeed, ours is an exceptional case. We'll need to@start by getting everyone on the same page.

group_1.textLeft: Yeah, just look at Mii.@If I hadn't gone to the Tomorrow Shop,
I'd never have started talking to people@from the West.

group_1.textRight: Now that you say that, it sounds like we're bound@for misunderstandings right from the get-go.
And I guess that leaves us to act as mediators...?!

group_1.textLeft: It's not an enjoyable role to play.
Being caught in between that Magical Girl war@against the East and West was...difficult.
I'm sorry for all the trouble we caused back then...
I apologize, Miyako...@Though there's nothing words can fix.

group_1.textRight: It's in the past. Don't worry about it.
We'll do what we can to help smooth things out.
But we should ensure people stuck in the middle@can express their anguish as well.

group_1.textLeft: Yes, moving forward it'll be necessary for us to@have proper communication and organization.

group_1.textRight: Oh, speaking of messaging, you're havin' an@interview soon, right Yachiyo?
For a local magazine or something?

group_1.textLeft: Right.
We mentioned the student conference on TV@the other day, remember?
That got some people interested, so we're@going to have a talk about it.

group_1.textRight: You're like the face of Kamihama, Yachiyo!

group_1.textLeft: That's a bit much, don't you think?

group_1.textRight: Still, if we can take advantage of your popularity@like this,
that ought to give a big boost to our operations.

group_1.textLeft: Please, I'm not one for public relations work.
And I'm hesitant for us to grow too quickly.@Let's keep things steady.

group_1.textRight: What's gotten you smiling like that, Yacchan?

group_1.textLeft: Hey, Mifuyu.
It's nothing. I'm just happy.
Rena was in such a bad place before, but she's@looking much better now.

group_1.textRight: Since you told us all about the radio tower,
I think everyone's found some ease after seeing@things for themselves.

group_1.textLeft: I wouldn't say "everyone."
It only brought down Felicia's mood, for one...

group_1.textRight: Right, I shouldn't have said that.

group_1.textLeft: Even though Iroha and the others are determined@to keep saving Magical Girls, hopeful as ever,
it doesn't change the fact that they're gone.

group_1.textRight: ...It's like when your friend and your shield dies.
People must be feeling the same sort of way...

group_1.textLeft: Hm?@Tsuruno...?
What's wrong?

group_1.textRight: I can't find Felicia!
